narrative.title: 3Rd Infantry Division - 1942Q4

operations.name: Operation Torch - Fedala Landing
operations.role: Assault landing at Fedala, 15 miles NE of Casablanca
operations.outcome: Success - French armistice after 3 days, minimal casualties

situation.combat_effectiveness: Untested - first combat action. Encountered limited Vichy French resistance. Armistice concluded before major combat could test division capabilities.

narrative.axis_objective: Maintain defensive positions and inflict maximum casualties on Allied forces.
narrative.allied_objective: Advance and secure strategic objectives while minimizing casualties.
